description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD.  From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 本課程主要著重於讓學生瞭解在日常生活中，食衣住行育樂等活動與化學之相互關係。尤其對在生活中所接觸之食品、衣著、環境與用品應有所認識，並以化學觀點了解其與人體之關係。此課程主要內容包括(1)食品化學(Food Chemistry)，(2)衣著化學 (Cloth Chemistry)，(3)環境化學(Environmental Chemistry)，(4)核化學(Nuclear Chemistry)，(5)水化學 (Hydrochemistry)，(6)界面化學 (Interface Chemistry)，(7)家庭用化學品 (Household Chemicals)，(8)化粧品學(Cosmetic Chemistry)，(9)電化學 (Electrochemistry)
description.en: This course focuses on chemistry related to People`s Livelihood, including: Food Chemistry, Cloth Chemistry, Environmental Chemistry, Nuclear Chemistry, Hydrochemistry, Interface Chemistry, Household Chemicals, Cosmetic Chemistry, and Electrochemistry. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of People`s Livelihood chemicals are also discussed in this course.

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fabric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

description.zh: 為涵養水量、維護水質以及保育水土資源，對於集水區內土地的使用，應有適當的規劃與管理牽涉的問題，一般以水資源利用、水質控制、管理計畫等課題加以涵括。因此本課程包含水資源情勢分析、水利法規、水權管理、點源及非點源污染管理、地下水規劃與管理、民眾參與及生態工法於集水區治理工程之應用等，俾提供適度發展及兼顧自然生態機能的集水區社區總體生活，達成「水、土、林、人」四贏之水資源保育總體目標。
description.en: In order to preserve water quantity, to protect water quality, and to conserve soil and water resources, it is necessary to institute appropriate land use regulations in a watershed. In general, it is included water resources utilization, water quality control and management. Therefore the major topics are water resources tendency, water law, water right, point and non-point sources pollution control, ground water management, public participation, ecological working method, etc. With appropriate public participation, the government can work together with people in community development in a manner which will enrich local cultural characteristics, and provide ideas for a sustainable growth, which would lead to a high quality of life and also would protect the watershed's ecology . The ultimate goal of making these efforts is to achieve a " water-soil-trees-men ", four-win situation.

description.zh: 以CAD繪圖軟體為教學範本，熟悉及應用繪圖指令，繪製機械之二度、三度空間的機械圖形，並能充分應用電腦的功能，以達輔助機械製圖及電腦輔助設計為目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g. : Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawing, to edit and to modify the Menu Script and Block etc...

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

description.zh: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。
description.en: This course focuses on the design and evaluation of interactive systems from a human centric perspective. Students will learn about the theories and models of human cognitive processing with the consideration of task and enviroment characteristics; and students will learn how to apply design processes and evaluation techniques for improving system performance.

description.zh: 介紹人體生物力學及肌肉骨骼等組織之特性，以及應用於工作場所相關之生物力學知識，以評估工具效益、肌肉骨骼負荷及肌肉骨骼傷害風險。課程內容包括肌肉骨骼系統的組成與結構、人體計測資料與應用、靜態人體生物力學模型、NIOSH抬舉公式、動態生物力學模型與量測設備、手工具設計與生物力學電腦模擬。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the mechanical behavior and its application of the musculoskeletal system and component tissues when physical work is performed. The lectures cover：anatomy/strength of biomaterials/muscle physiology, anthropometry, spine biomechanics, static biomechanical models and NIOSH lifting equation, bioinstrumentation and dynamic biomechanical models, hand tool design, and computer simulation of biomechanics.

description.zh: 本課程乃有系統地探討行銷管理理論及其應用，強調重要觀念的解析，並以國內外實例與生活見聞來解釋學理的應用。藉以提升同學對行銷議題的興趣，並培養同學分析與解決行銷問題的能力。
description.en: This course is a systematic approach to marketing management theory and its applications, emphasized the importance of the concept of resolution, and to their knowledge of life and abroad to explain the examples and theoretical applications. In order to enhance students interested in the subject of marketing and nurture students to analyze and solve marketing problems.

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 本課程以逐步口譯為主﹐深入模擬商務訪談﹐會議溝通﹐外賓接待至國際會議主持﹐隨行口譯﹐各式談判之概論與實例解說。課程注重模擬﹐演練及禮儀文化的涵養，以期訓練學生語言應對的能力及良好風度的表現。
description.en: This course focuses on Consecutive Interpretation. It simulates a commercial meeting and communication, visitors reception, international conference hosting and escort interpretation. In addition, it includes a general theory of different negotiations and examples. The course concentrates on simulation, practicum and courtesy cultivation. We expect to build up students' dialogue ability and manners.

name.en: Skills and Practicum of Escorting English

description.zh: 本課程提供在各種場合中口譯的應用。如伴隨工廠參觀，出席展覽會場，開幕演說，及外賓接待，採取密集的口語演練，並訓練隨行解說的技巧。
description.en: This course provides an application of Interpretation for different occasions. These situations include a factory visit, an exhibition presentation, an opening address, a foreign-visitors reception and a banquet attendance. This course aims to build up the techniques and cultivation of Escort Interpretation through intensive oral training.

description.zh: 英語表演語言，又稱詞誦競技，為當代全球文化之顯學。該類型之表演多兼具書寫與表演性素材，如音樂、戲劇，以及多媒體特效。本課程將引領學生深入瞭解口語詞誦表演之全貌。課程不僅訓練學生寫作能力，更培養其於短詩、短篇故事、相聲、嘻哈韻文、自述、短劇或朗誦方面的創作書寫技巧，進而揭示口語詞誦表演於當代社會之價值與重要性。課程期間所研讀之作品將透過概念化與實際演練，或以附加之表演元素，如音樂(課程內容包含基礎詞創)、演出，以及具聲光特效之多媒體實驗性手法予以呈現。評分則視學生於期中前擬定之主題概念、活動投入程度和期末全校公演之表現為標準。
description.en: poken word performances (often called "slams") are currently popular around the world.  Such performances usually combine written with performatory material, such as music, theatre and multi-media special effects.  This class will prepare the student for an exciting foray into the realm of spoken word performance.  Students will not just write-but write for performance-short poems or stories, brief comedy-monologues, hip-hop rhymes, autobiographical accounts, and/or brief dramatic pieces or recitations.  These works will be conceptualized, rehearsed and maybe even re-envisioned by the addition of performatory elements such as music (basic songwriting is included in the class curriculum), staging, and multi-media experimentation with lights, sound, color and special effects.  Grading will be based on diligence in developing a mid-term preparatory sketch of your main idea and a final performance before an audience of NTUT students and faculty.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程強調全方位的國際商用英語溝通。現今各領域上之商業活動多以英語進行，因此本課程注重發展學生以英語文進行流暢之溝通的關鍵能力，特別強調商業組織內外部常見的正式溝通之形式，包括商用英語寫作、簡報與會議技巧。課時也納入非正式溝通技巧，指導學生學習應對職場情境，因應相關之溝通需求。
description.en: This current course emphasizes a holistic view of business communication in a global context.  Given that business communication across from fields of business activities is now made possible by the English language, the course thus aims to develop the ability to use critical skills essential to successful communication in English, with particular emphases on forms of formal communications that are highly visible within and outside business organizations, including writing of business correspondence and reports, presentations and meetings. Informal communication skills are also incorporated to address workplace situations to identify the relevant communication needs.

description.zh: 本課程著重於高級聽力與口說能力之培養，使學生之聽講能力訓練進階至主題式的學習. 教材提昇至多元化之主題，包括商業、貿易、法律、政治、社會、文化、觀光等層面。教法上強調生動的多媒體輔助與高效的演練，針對以上教材主題，訓練學生聽取他人語言意涵及口語表達能力。此外，希望藉由此訓練，培養學生學習的策略，進而對自我學習產生負責的態度。
description.en: This course is designed to better students' listening and speaking skills; to accelerate their vocabulary build-up and application to relevant topics, and to encourage their familiarity with the sophisticated, various, and contemporary themes.  Materials used include socio-cultural realities of economics, business, politics, tourism, and family life. This class stresses global comprehension and attention to discrete points-such as paralinguistic aspects or accents. Activities encompass oral presentations, group discussion, collaborative project and self-report. Students are guided to work out strategies for themselves and are encouraged to adopt a certain responsibility for their own learning.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

description.zh: 商業與科技的日新月異乃現代生活之重要標的，本課程選讀書報雜誌中有關經貿企管等商業論述，以及科技資訊等相關文章，以討論方式，引導學生進入現代工商科技化的英語環境。
description.en: This course will guide students to read articles on technology and business from a variety of sources (books, magazines, newspapers, television scripts, etc.)  Students are required to actively participate in the speaking activities in the classroom which may involve group discussion and oral presentation of a specific topic.

name.zh: 第二語言習得專題討論

description.zh: 本課程將對第二語言習得的主要議題進行深入地探討論與分析。上課的內容包括，但不限於，下列主題: 語言天賦、跨語言影響、人格特質、學習動機、學習風格、學習策略、外語焦慮和外語學習信念等。
description.en: This course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of selected issues and problems in second language acquisition. The topics covered in this course include, but are not limited to, the following: language aptitude, cross-linguistic influences, personality, motivation, leaning styles, learning strategies, language anxiety, and learners' beliefs.

description.zh: 詞彙學討論語言的約定俗成模式，(經常通過語料庫查詢方法) 發現無所不在的固定/習慣性表達以及妥貼的字詞搭配方式，是適當理解與運用自然語言的關鍵。經由此課程，學生將獲得包含詞彙/片語單位及其意義聯想、指認、使用情境的各種知識層面。
description.en: Phraseology addresses the conventional patterns of language use, such as the pervasiveness of formulaic/idiomatic expressions and appropriate collocations (often through the use of corpus-based methods). It is key to the proper interpretation and production of a language in its natural use. Through this course, students are expected to acquire facets of knowledge including lexical/phraseological units and their meaning associations, identifications, and situations of use.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創作能力，寫作文類包括詩、小說和戲劇，乃至任何別出心裁的新類型，如以非小說類型呈現的多媒體創作。學生經由本課程所學的教巧訓練和寫作策略的運用，不但將具備寫作的能力和深度，更可直接將此能力學以致用，發揮在專業寫作上，包括新聞、設計、廣告以及藝術管理行政。
description.en: Students in this course obtain practical experience writing poetry, fiction and drama, as well as in working with the newly emergent creative writing genres of creative non-fiction and multi-media performance.  The skills, techniques and strategies learned in this class will not only help students realize their own abilities and insights as writers, but are directly applicable to wide range of professions, including journalism, design, advertising and arts organization administration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討下列議題:文學與藝術的創作和女性自覺有什麼樣的關係?在現代社會,文學與藝術作品的創作與欣賞對女性又具有何種特別的意義?為追索答案,本課程引領學生探訪自十九世紀末期到今日在文藝界的女性翹楚,賞析她們在各自領域的獨特成就,並探究她?的天賦秉性與所置身之社會文化之互動關係.涵蓋的領域包括:詩,(短篇)小說,戲劇(舞台與電影劇本),散文,攝影,電影,繪畫,建築設計等當今文化重要面向.
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students toward a panoramic view and in-depth understanding of women's creativity at its highest level of achievement in the realms of British/American literature and the modern arts since the late nineteenth century.  We will study the most representative works by women writers in each of the following literary genres: poetry, short stories, novels, drama (and screenplays), and essays. We will also explore masterpieces of artworks by female artists in the following fields: film, photography, paintings and architectural designs. Students will be asked to explore the correlation among the significance of the writer/artist's works, the cultural background she is/was situated, and the individual talents and temperament of the writer/artist herself. The purpose of these investigations is to answer the following questions:  What do literature and art have to do with femininity in the modern world? What do literature and art mean to women?

name.zh: 譯學新趨勢與翻譯實踐
name.en: New Trends in Translation Studies and Translation Practice

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹20世紀90年代之後翻譯研究興起的「全球化轉向」與「社會學轉向」兩大新趨勢，並深入探討其對翻譯實踐與譯者專業素養所可能帶來的啟示。課程欲含括之翻譯議題如下：（1）全球化轉向-全球化與本土化張力、跨文化溝通、文化認同、權力關係、譯者中介、科技與翻譯、翻譯商品化、非專業翻譯；（2）社會學轉向-翻譯的社會因素（如社會制約與機制）、譯者的社會層面（如譯者角色、慣習與網絡）、翻譯過程的社會學研究（如品質管控、編修與團隊翻譯）。除論文之研讀外，亦將透過翻譯實例的分析（包括新聞、字幕、旅遊、廣告、網頁、商業與文學翻譯等實例），讓學生明瞭這些新趨勢如何引導翻譯實踐，並使其重新省思譯者的專業素養。此外，英漢/漢英翻譯實作與譯評亦為授課重點，期藉此協助學生與時並進，構思適切的翻譯策略。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the "globalization turn" and "sociological turn" in translation studies after the 1990s. An exploration will also be made into their possible implications for translation practice and the translator's qualifications. Translation issues to be addressed may include the following: (1) the globalization turn - the tension between globalization and localization, cross-cultural communication, cultural identity, power relations, the translator's mediation, technology and translation, the commoditization of translation services and non-professional translation (such as fansubbing and scanlation); (2) the sociological turn - socio factors of translation (e.g. social constraints and mechanisms), social aspects of the translator's profession (e.g. the translator's role, habitus and network), and the sociology of the translating process (e.g. quality control, revision and team translation). Through concrete examples of authentic translations, this course will enable s

description.zh: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、反應機構、及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
description.en: This course focuses the contemporary developments in the study of the structure of carbon compounds and the mechanism of their reactions. Selected topics such as natural product, heterocyclic compound, stereochemistry, aromaticity, reaction intermediates, peptides synthesis and photochemistry will be included.

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1.簡介；2.電子商店的行銷策略；3.電子商店的建   置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6.案例介紹；7.結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion。

name.en: Human Computer Interaction on media convergence Platform

description.zh: 本課程將提供學生如何學習整合手持行動裝置以及電腦視覺技術，利用電腦視覺技術，進行影像擷取，並分析影像中所表示之操作指令，並將分析結果轉換為電腦操作指令，已達到人機互動之功效，並整合實現於一套手持行動裝置平台上，除了讓學生可學習電腦視覺技術，也藉由手持行動裝置來實現之途徑，學習到軟硬體整合之經驗。
description.en: The objective of this course is to teach students design methodologies, developing tools, and implementation on media converged platform (handheld devices) for human-computer interaction applications. The topics include: 1. Introduce system development platform and tool-chains on handheld devices. 2. Developing software using opensource GUI and computer vision libraries. 3. Developing Vision-based techniques for intelligent human-computer interaction on handheld devices . 4. Developing augmented reality applications on handheld devices

name.en: Human Computer Interaction on media convergence Platform

description.zh: 本課程將提供學生如何學習整合手持行動裝置以及電腦視覺技術，利用電腦視覺技術，進行影像擷取，並分析影像中所表示之操作指令，並將分析結果轉換為電腦操作指令，已達到人機互動之功效，並整合實現於一套手持行動裝置平台上，除了讓學生可學習電腦視覺技術，也藉由手持行動裝置來實現之途徑，學習到軟硬體整合之經驗。
description.en: The objective of this course is to teach students design methodologies, developing tools, and implementation on media converged platform (handheld devices) for human-computer interaction applications. The topics include: 1. Introduce system development platform and tool-chains on handheld devices. 2. Developing software using opensource GUI and computer vision libraries. 3. Developing Vision-based techniques for intelligent human-computer interaction on handheld devices . 4. Developing augmented reality applications on handheld devices

notes: 四資四和資工所合開,周二第6節在系教室上課

description.zh: 在重製呈現的架構下，空間理論包含真實空間如何被感知與認知，如何於媒材上呈現為圖像空間，以及如何在媒材上的圖像空間去描述一未來(現在、或過去) 存在的真實空間。本課程藉由平行檢視視覺心理學的空間理論與其相關的近代數位應用，以數位影像媒材的角度來重新探討空間理論，並用以發展可能的研究主題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to examine the interrelations between space, media, and media space from a computational point of view. Weekly seminar focuses on the review of theories of space, conventional and computational representation, and methods that underlie the research applications relate to media and media space.

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

notes: 教室將依選修人數再做調整,互動所和資工所合開

description.zh: 1.晶體與接面原理；2.發光與檢光基本原理；3.發光元件-LEDs 及雷射二極體；4.檢光元件---紅外線檢光器及太陽電池；5液晶顯示器；6.光纖損失與色散；7.光纖通訊系統。
description.en: In this lecture, the following topics will be introduced:1.Fudamentals of crystals and junctions;2.Basic principles of light emission and detection;3.Light-emitting devices;4.Light-detecting devices;5.Liquid crystal displays;6.Losses and dispersions of optical fibers;     7.Fiber optic communication systems.

notes: 四電二甲乙丙合開，修課人數限80人

description.zh: 課程內容包含個體經濟、總體經濟、國際貿易之基本理論與模型、我國臺灣地區經濟發展策略與展望。
description.en: Micro and macro economics, the theories and models of international trade, the economic development strategies and prospects of the Taiwan region.

notes: 四電四甲乙丙合開，修課人數限80人

description.zh: 泰勒多項式，求根法，數值微分與積分，差分式，誤差分析，矩陣分解，微分方程數值解，數值解軟體應用
description.en: Taylor series, equation solving, numerical differentiation and integration, difference equations, error analysis, matrix equation solving, solving differential equations, numerical code application

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生七大項方向1.複習矩陣學2.結構矩陣學基本概念3.勁度法觀念4.勁度法解桁架問題5.勁度法解梁問題6.勁度法解剛架問題7.程式分析實習
description.en: The course contents are divided into 7 major topics: 1. Review the matrix theory; 2.Basic concepts of the matrix structural theory; 3. Stiffness method; 4. Using stiffness method to solve truss problem; 5. Using stiffness method to solve beam problem; 6. Using stiffness method to solve rigid frame problem; 7. Practice of the structural analysis program.

description.zh: 1.光的電磁理論回顧2.光學系統光束追跡3.高斯光學4.共振腔理論5. 原子輻射6.雷射振盪與放大7.雷射種類與應用
description.en: 1.Review of Electromagnetic Theory2.Ray Tracing in Optical System3.Gaussian Beams in Optical Media4.Optical Resonator and Cavity Theory5.Atomic Radiation6.Laser Oscillation, Amplification, and Excitation7.Laser Characteristics, Category, and Applications

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：1.電磁波光學2.高斯光束3.共振腔理論4. 原子輻射5.雷射與放大器原理7.雷射特性 8.雷射的應用
description.en: This course introduces: 1. Electromagnetic Optics 2.Gaussian Beams 3.Optical resonators 4.Atomic radiation 5.Principles of lasers and amplifiers 6. General characteristics of lasers 7. Laser applications

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

description.zh: 本課程主要了解行銷研究的本質與特性，掌握行銷研究要領，進而具備規劃與執行行銷研究的能力，包含下列：行銷研究的環境與基本觀念，網路資料庫介紹，資料蒐集模式與方法，問卷設計與抽樣，量表製作，資料分析，研究成果呈現與溝通。
description.en: This course aims to help participants understand the nature and features of marketing research, realize how to conduct marketing research, and develop a toolset for the planning and implementation of marketing research. It has the followings: Background of Marketing Research, Introduction to Marketing Research, Database and Data Collection: Types and Methods, Measurement Instruments and Sampling, Data Analysis, Communicating with Research Users.

name.zh: 嵌入式即時多工核心開發與應用
name.en: The Development and Application of Embedded Multitasking Real-time Kernel

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式即時多工核心，瞭解其架構，並學習嵌入式即時多工核心之設計與相關應用技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹，(2)即時多工系統觀念介紹，(3)即時多工核心運作方式，(4)工作管理，(5)時間管理，(6)記憶體管理，(7)事件管理，(8)於嵌入式系統建制即時多工核心。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded multitasking real-time kernel.  They will parse the structure of multitasking real-time kernel; learn the skill to design the embedded multitasking real-time kernel and the application technology.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded system introduction, (2)Multitasking real-time concept, (3)Kernel structure, (4)Task management, (5) Time management, (6)Memory management, (7) Event management, (8)Real-Time kernel porting.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括通風系統基礎，工業通風，排煙設計，空氣過濾、送風系統設計及安裝與測試，以系統設計為重點。
description.en: The contents of this course include the fundamentals of ventilation system, industrial ventilation, exhaust design, air filtration, air moving system design, construction and testing, the focus of this course is on the system design.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 本科目將由認識地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之太陽能源有效利用裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。
description.en: The aim of this course is to discuss three individual topics of more specialized nature: large PV systems, photo-voltaic under concentrated sunlight and the hydrogen economy. After completing this course the students should be able to:1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems, an    examine their economic and technical characteristics.2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator    PV systems, and discuss their operation.3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show    its feasibility and future   potential.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 細部設計之任務是接續基本設計之工作，以較大之比例圖說表達設計者之設計概念，其中包含材料之經驗型知識及其應用。教學上透過理論傳授以及對各種材料之特性體驗、繪製圖說、施作，以達教學目的。
description.en: The task of Detail Design is to extend the design concept of basic design in larger scale. It includes the empirical knowledge of materials and their applications. Through theory delivery and acquaintances of all kind of materials, design drawing    and practice to reach the teaching goal.

notes: 四建三和四創意三合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討敷地計畫的規劃及設計技術如何應用於實際的操作層面。以敷地計畫的基本內容為單元，介紹各種實際案例並分析其特點。學生透過課堂的討論及實地的調查、分析，來瞭解敷地計畫的實際工作內容並研習各種課題的對策、解決方法，使其具備更豐富的專業知識應用於建築設計的相關領域。
description.en: The course is to explore the practical skills on site planning techniques. The course covers the basic components and their various applications of the site planning. Both advantages and disadvantages of each application are introduced. Through class discussions and field studies, students are able to understand the actual contents and issues of the site planning. The strategies and solutions to the planning problems will be facilitated to help students to get the better professional abilities of related architectural design works.

notes: 四建三和四創意三合開

description.zh: 本課程訓練運用數位科技能力，以進行建築領域中的複雜幾何設計形體的發展、描述、資訊擷取，並透過系統化流程加以合理化，以至建造完成。本課程授課方式為演講及實作並行，課程預期修課者發展出一套有創意的數位構築系統。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in digital technologies for extracting, developing, and analyzing data of complex geometries, while facilitating production of a systematic workflow for rationalization and constructability. The course will be conducted in the forms of lectures and tutorials, and expects students to develop unique and creative systems of digital fabrication.

notes: 四建三和四創意三合開，限50人

description.zh: 根據照明工學之專業知識及技術了解照明的光源與色彩效果、照度標準、各種照明方式及照明器具特性等以配合各室內空間的特性、照明要求及室內家具的配置等，作適當之照明計劃。
description.en: Students will be introduced to the essence of light and various working methods of a lighting designer, the basics and the technology applied in the lighting expression. They will familiarize themselves with the nature and control of electrical light in terms of light sources, color temperature, lighting systems and equipment, lighting and space, lighting design process, and the special features of lighting design. In addition, students will learn about making light plots, apertures and equipment evaluation.

notes: 四設三和四創意三合開(家室組)

description.zh: 藉由大量的人物寫生，從人性關懷的角度速寫記錄人生百態，速寫重點要「神」、「形」兼備。下一步是靜態單人速寫練習，體態美見於動、靜、張、弛的表現，且比例要正確。下筆速、簡、精、準、是練習重點。接下來是靜態雙人、多人速寫練習。除了依循單人速寫練習要點，並加入空間透視感，使畫面構成更生動有趣。
description.en: The course begins with a lot of figure sketching. You have to care about all walks of life, and actively observe and record their figures. Try to master both the charm and the form of the model.  Next focusing on static mono-figure sketching, you have to demonstrate your techniques in presenting either the static or the dynamic, the state of tension or looseness. You also have to be precise in proportion when you do your sketch. Stress definitely on the practice of speediness, simplicity, accuracy, and preciseness. Also work on static twin-figure and multi-figure sketching. Besides incorporating guidelines from the previous activity, you have to add the sense of spatial perspective to make your sketch more vivid and

notes: 四設二三四和四創意三合開

description.zh: 應用快速手繪觀念結合數位技術等工具軟體，使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果。
description.en: Teaching student to use digital software to simulate design proposal for a perfect presentation.

notes: 四設三和四創意三合開(產品組)

name.en: Introduction to History of Architecture Technology

description.zh: 建築技術與建築文化關係密切， 技術扎根於過去，主宰著現在伸向未來。（如太陽能之應用發展省能建築以及微氣候與建築規劃、生態建築。）中國建築技術史主要參考古今圖書集成及中國科技史等文獻中有關我國古代的宮室、園林、都城以及豐富多彩的地方民居等等的構造、施工、材料、技術的精華所在。
description.en: This course gives a brief tauch with those technologies related buildings and construction, that student may appreciate the architecture from a technical viewpoint.

name.en: Special Topic on the Aesthetic of Architectural Construciton

description.zh: 在每個文明的進程中，會因為其環境風土條件與技術需求，發展出來其特有的建築營造系統，而在此營造系統中，又會因為建築空間文化形式、材料、審美等不同的內在或是外在的條件，進而發展出在建築的整體空間與構造細部上有不同的作法。本課程分別針對人類的建築歷史上重要的建築文明系統發展與其美學，從希臘時期、羅馬時期、哥德時期的石造建築技術，一直到十九世紀工業革命以後至廿世紀的鑄鐵、鋼鐵、鋼筋混凝土等現代建築發展過程中的建築構造，以材料特性與工法內容分別討論其形貌以及美學建構的內容。
description.en: In Human History, each civilization would develop its construction system, which might be influenced by the physic environment and the technics it requests. In similar or different construction systems, it would derive into different aspects and ways of combination in the spatial forms and constructive d?tails, due to the inner or outer conditions, such as different cultural forms, materials and aesthetics, etc. This seminar bases on the architectural history of different civilizations, from Greek, Roman, Gothic epochs, to the post industrial r?volution of the Nineteenth Century and Twentieth Century. We would like to study the aspect and aesthetic through the ancient architecture of mason construction to those modern or modernist architecture of different materials such as iron, steel, or reinforced concrete, etc.

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

description.zh: 介紹高動態範圍數位影像之理論基礎與相關技術。在光環境模擬與視覺空間感知兩架構下，介紹高動態範圍數位影像技術在建築照明實務與空間感知研究的應用。
description.en: Introduce the theories and techniques of High Dynamic Range Imaging. Weekly seminars focus on its applications in architectural lighting, and research applications in space perception.

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

name.en: Advanced Study on Urban Disaster Management

description.zh: 台灣是全球最為脆弱地區之一，加以都市集約發展，每當災害發生，很容易造成人民生命財產嚴重損失。本課程目的在於加強同學應用災害管理、資源配置、實質規劃知識與應變能力於建築及都市規劃專業領域；藉由國內外文獻探討、個案研究、課程研討與專家座談等方法，針對災害種攞、防災與減災的建築計畫與土地使用規劃、災害防救體系、環境變遷及衍生議題、資源配置、複合型災害衝擊、因應氣候變遷之災害調適策略與機制、災後安置、產業復甦與社區重建等議題深入的探討，以培育高階設計與規劃管理人才。
description.en: Taiwan located in one of the world's most vulnerable areas with highly urban development, whenever disaster occurred; it is likely to cause serious economic and live losses. The course aims to strengthen students' applications of disaster management, resource allocation, physical planning knowledge and adaptability to architectural design and urban planning. Through the literatures review, case studies, seminar and discussion with experts, we would focus on the types of disasters, disaster prevention and disaster reduction of building plans and land-use planning, disaster prevention and response systems, environmental changes and derivative issues, resource allocation, compound disaster impact, adaptative strategies and mechanisms to climate change, post-disaster resettlement, industrial recovery and community reconstruction issues, in order to cultivate high-level design, planning and management talents.

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維製品在非衣著終端領域之應用，例如電子電機，土木，材料，生醫，航空與車輛工程等之應用。其內容包括功能性與機能性纖維、複合紗、複合織物、編帶、非織物、纖維系複合材料與電線電纜、光纖電纜等之製造方法、原理與其終端應用領域。最後將討論微細加工技術與微細粉末在纖維與高科技工業上之應用。
description.en: The course is to interpret the application of the non-apparel textiles at the different end uses, such as application in electrical and electronic, civil, material, biomedical, aerospace, and vehicle engineering etc.  It includes fabrication methods, principles, and end application fields of the performance and functional fibers, composite yarns, composite fabrics, braid, nonwoven, textile composites, and cables and optical cables etc.　Finally, the micro processing technology and powder in textile and high-tech industries will be discussed.

name.zh: 德國設計研究與體驗(二)
name.en: Design Research and Experience in Germany (II)

description.zh: 赴德研習之進階課程；創新設計實務與文化相關之研究，以建立德國設計研究與體驗基礎。課程內容以調查研究德國設計相關設計資源﹐包含學校﹐設計展﹐博物館﹐文化及語言等內容。
description.en: This course provides research of design in Germany related topics on culture and Design. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and experiential verification.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述設計研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in design research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 本課程係透過對文化之研究與解析，解構出具備設計發展之要素，並藉由設計專題之研討，實際應用文化意涵進行設計創作，發展出具創新之商品與服務，藉以培養學生對各種文化之解析能力，與設計應用之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on the deconstruction of design element through the study and analysis of culture. This course also focuses on the training of students’ ability of multiple-culture analysis and design application through the design topic seminar and cultural-meaning-applied design practice that develop innovative products and service.

description.zh: 家具設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved furniture design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

name.zh: 設計反思與設計創作實務

description.zh: 介紹反思在設計學習及設計活動之意義及其相關類別及方法, 課程中將進行個人及團隊式之設計創作實務演練及反思體驗, 以擴大設計經驗的學習成效，達成設計者的知識、態度和技能得以增加、調適或改變的成長目的。
description.en: Introduction to the meaning of design reflection to design learning and design practice. Students are guided to implement reflective practice in personal or team design activities. It is aimed to facilitate design reflection to advance the effects of design experiences on design leaning.

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於提供方法，用來分析任何型式的結構物受任意動荷重所產生的應力與變化。
description.en: The primary purpose of this course is to present methods for analyzing the stresses and deflections developed in any given type of structure whenit is subjected to an arbitary dynamic loading.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

description.zh: 化工概論是一門針對進入化工領域之初學者，提供全面性介紹的課程，引導學生瞭解化學工程的內容及未來的化工生涯，並介紹我國化工業的現況及未來展望。此外，本課程還提供許多專業以外的知識,以加強一個化學工程師的訓練。
description.en: This course introduces students the fundamentals of chemical Engineering Courses will help students realize the various applications chemical engineering and the future carrier development. The course will also provide the professional knowledge and intensive training on chemical engineers.

notes: 四化一丙和四工程一合開

description.zh: 本課程教授非線性方程式、聯立方程式、常微分方程式及偏微分方程式等之數值解答技巧，並在電腦輔助下解決工程上之問題。
description.en: This course is a way to do higher mathematics problems on a computer.  It includes solving nonlinear equations, sets of equations, interpolation and curving fitting, numerical differentiation and integration, and differential equations.

description.zh: 本課程著重於中英文口頭報告能力之培養，在模擬發表過程中，培養學生使用正確的表達用法，並建立適當之應對方式。
description.en: This course offers opportunities for students to develop their oral presentation skills in both Chinese and English languages via simulated presentations in class.  Students will learn how to present their papers precisely and how to engage a conversation properly.

description.zh: 觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維。以真實具體的創新開發與創業經驗為教材，進而激發學生追求科技創新成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Through domestic business manager experiences, we hope students to learn domestic business manager thoughts of enterprise's innovations and creations. By offering the real innovation in development and specific examples; furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their innovation wills to plan the future.

notes: 四化四甲乙丙合開,限50人,嚴隆財董事長0.9

name.en: Project of electrical machinery control technology

description.zh: 1.轉矩控制簡介  2.磁通鏈估測  3.滑差及轉速估測 4.參數估測 5.感應機向量控制  6.感應機直接轉矩控制  7.同步機向量控制  8.同步機直接轉矩控制
description.en: 1.introduction to torque-controlled drives  2.flux-linkage estimation  3.slip and speed estimation  4.parameters estimation  5.vector control of induction machines   6.direct torque control of induction machines    7.vector control of synchronous machines  8.direct torque control of synchronous machines.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 簡介，人工智慧語言介紹及工業應用，專家系統。
description.en: Introduction, Artificial Intelligence, programing language and its industrial application, expert system.

notes: 自動化所.機電所.製科所和車輛所合開

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（二）

description.zh: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
description.en: The course aims to develop the student's techniques of listening, analyzing and critical thinking in English. A variety of journalistic and media texts will be selected from newspapers, magazines and T.V. to reinforce listening training and note-taking skills. Besides, some controversial or interesting issues will be discussed in class to encourage the student's independent and critical thinking.

name.zh: LEED基礎概論和專業證照備考

description.zh: LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design)為能源與環境先導設計，美國綠建築協會制訂之綠建築評估認證，本課程將提供LEED基礎概述和 LEED專業認證考試準備的說明，課程大綱主要為了解LEED綠建築評分認證系統之核心概念。另外課堂授課將會進行LEED專業認證考試準備課程和考前課題練習。
description.en: This course will provide an overview of the LEED Fundamentals (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) and instructions for preparation of the LEED Green Associate Exam. All topics are geared toward understanding the core concepts of LEED and the LEED Green Building Rating Systems. Class lectures will conclude with an overview of recommended study methods and practice questions for the LEED Green Associate exam.

notes: 四創意三.四和四車三四合開,實習在車輛系工廠

name.zh: 國際LEED綠建築證照及實務講座
name.en: LEED Green Building Rating Systems Seminars

description.zh: 領先能源與環境設計(Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design, LEED)是美國綠建築協會在1998年設立的一項綠建築評分認證系統，用以評估建築績效是否能符合永續性。綠色建築專業人員可以通過LEED專業認證考試(LEED Professional Exams)成為LEED認證專業人員。通過專業認證的人員能幫助不同LEED系統的建築評級。本課程將邀請國內外專業綠領建築師以親身經驗講授如何取得認證，以協助學生取得未來國際綠建築執業之能力。
description.en: The LEED Green Building Rating System, which was launched in 1998, was initiated by the U.S. Green Building Council (USGBC) Membership, representing all segments of the building industry and providing a definitive standard for what constitutes a “green building.” For professionals who are seeking to earn credentials and certificates can take and pass the LEED Professional Exams which are administered by the GBCI (Green Building Certification Institute). LEED credentials distinguish professionals across many sustainable building design and construction disciplines. This seminar is a platform for green building professionals to share their experience on national and international projects with students. The main objective of this seminar is to help students to build a career in sustainable building design and construction after the completion of their study.

notes: 四建三和最後一哩合開,限90人,五567節上課

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

description.zh: 先修課程：機動學(機構學)、計算機(電腦)程式語言概論、機構運動分析(位置、速度及加速度分析的解析法)、連桿組傳遞角與機械利益的分析、凸輪機構運動分析、壓力角與曲率半徑的分析、齒輪組動力傳遞分析、機構的電腦模擬、機構個案分析。
description.en: Introduction, Kinematic analysis of mechanism(Analysis of Displacement, Velocity and Acceleration by Analytical method), Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage of Linkage, Kinematic Analysis, Pressure angle and Profile's Curvature of Cam, Power Flow Analysis of Gear Trains, Computer Simulation of Mechanisms, and Case Study of Mechanism.

notes: 四機三甲乙丙合開,限25人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程主要介紹幾何光學與Coherent光學兩部份之基本概念與應用﹐提供機械領域的學生有關光的知識﹐讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程首先介紹幾何光學﹐幾何光學雖然簡單﹐卻是光學應用最普遍的知識﹐接著進入Coherent光學原理與應用介紹﹐Coherent光學在光量測技術部份佔了非常重要的地位﹐透過本課程的訓練﹐學生將可更順利的進入光學實驗室工作﹐當然﹐本課程也適合其他對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
description.en: The lectures in this course include two main parts, the geometrical and the coherent optics. Due to the future high technology, the optomechatronics, needs the cooperation of knowledge among the optics, the electrics, and the mechanics. This course gives the students of mechanical engineering the chance to participate in this work group. The lecture will first show the students the geometrical optics which is simple but important in the field of optical application. The coherent optics is the main part in this course which occupies the most optical technique of measurement. After the course the students should have the enough knowledge to work in the optical laboratory. Certainly, this course is also useful for all students who are interest in the area of the optics.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en: The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 1. fundamental metallographic concepts.2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.3. Hardenability 4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 本課程分兩學期授課，第一學期教授國際標準驗證ISO9001:2008，第二學期教授ISO14001:2004及OHSAS18001:2007。上完課程獲得學分外，並可參加第三者驗證機構考試獲得稽核員之證書。
description.en: This course is given lesson for two semesters. The content of first semester is ISO9001:2008, second semester is ISO14001:2004 andOHSAS18001:2007. Students can obtain the credit of this course and the certificate of auditor exam through third certification organization.

notes: 四機四甲乙丙合開,限50人

description.zh: 本課程內容主要希望讓學生認識「核輻射」及其安全與防護。修習內容將包括：輻射與物質作用、輻射度量與劑量、輻射防護與安全、輻射防護法規、核能安全之設計、放射性廢棄物處置、輻射的化學效應和生物效應、基本醫學影像技術-- X射線攝影、核磁共振、正子掃瞄。
description.en: The goal of this lecture hopes to offer students the knowledge in "Nuclear Radiation". It mainly includes: Interaction between matter and radiation; Radiation measurement and dosimetry; Radiation protection and safety; Regulation of radiation protection; Design in Nuclear safety; Radioactive waste management; Chemical and Biological effects by radiation; Basic introduction to medical imaging: CT, NMR, PET.

notes: 四機四甲乙丙合開,限50人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。量測原理及訊號處理的一般方法（含放大電路、動態響應及頻譜分析），說明各種感測器之原理、規格、結構圖、應用的場合及其訊號處理（含速度、位移、加速度、力量、扭矩、功率、壓力、流量、溫度、化學組成、濕度、濃度、照度、電流、電壓、磁通量、磁場強度、各型感測開關等），感測器與電腦之連線。
description.en: Measurement Principles, General Methods for Signal Processing (Amplified Circuits, Dynamic Response, and Frequency spectrum Analysis), Discussion of Principle, Specification, Structure, Occasion and Location of Application of a Variety of Sensors for Measuring Physical Quantities,such as Displacement, Velocity, Acceleration, Force, Torque, Power,Pressure, Flow Rate, Temperature, Chemical Composition, Humidity,Density, Luminosity, Current, Voltage, Magnetic Flux, Magnetic Intensity , a Variety of Sensing Switch, etc.

description.zh: (1)熟悉3D塑膠產品設計；(2)學會應用2D與3D軟體的操作模具設計與拆模；(3)射出成形模具的構造元件之規格與設計；(4)模具零件分解圖；(5)模具組立圖。
description.en: (1) To realize the 3D plastic molding part's design. (2)Mold design and dissolution by 3D CAD software. (3) Injection mold parts design and specification. (4) The explosion diagram of mold parts. (5) Injection mold assembly.

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 機電所和車輛所合開,碩士班畢業門檻,限碩班學生修

description.zh: 精確度、重覆性、精密度及解析度等、彈性變形及動態特性、背隙摩擦及動態特性、系統補償、精密機構及動態分析。
description.en: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.

notes: 乙/6選2 機電所和製科所合開

name.zh: 醫療器材開發數位化工程
name.en: Digital technology on medical device development

description.zh: 本課程目的在使學生了解醫療器材數位化發展趨勢，課程中透過介紹牙科及骨科等相關領域之應用。結合醫學資訊與3D 影像處理進行產品設計與創新製造工程，也是學習之重點。
description.en: Course purpose:To describe how to use 3D image information in medical device field, To use direct manufacturing technology in medical treatment, To know the current industrial trend.

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括:核能電廠系統熱流與安全分析、量化風險評估(Probabilistic Risk Assessment, 簡稱PRA)兩個主要部份。核能安全相關議題如，核反應器熱的產生、熱流與應力分析，核反應器重要系統與組件，核能電廠事故分析，核能電廠的環境輻射劑量。PRA技術可全面檢討核能電廠潛在弱點，提昇核電機組營運安全。內容包括基本機率理論介紹、隨機變數與分佈函數、可靠度方法論、事件樹與故障樹分析、不準度分析及傳播等方法。並將包括PRA技術在核能電廠系統之應用。
description.en: This lecture will mainly covers the thermal-hydraulics and safety analyses and the methods for probability of risk assessment (PRA) for nuclear power plants. Thermal hydraulics and safety analyses will includes: design of fission reactors; energy conversion in nuclear power systems; fluid flow system, thermal and structural analysis of reactor core. The weakness of nuclear power plants can be identified through the PRA technology. Therefore, the safety feature of the associated structures of systems and components will be improved. Lecture would include basic concept of probability, random variables and distribution functions, applications to the reliability assessment of components, event-tree and fault-tree analysis, uncertainty analysis and its propagation, etc. Examples and applications in nuclear plants will be addressed as well.

description.zh: 模具工程不只要讓初學者熟悉模具的設計，而且要讓有經驗的模具設計者也能夠以工程的方法來設計模具。此外模具工程也提供塑膠工業相關的從業人員瞭解模具知識，如銷售員與售後服務人員。課程內容分為四大部分：(1)基礎─包含模具、射出機、塑膠材料、產品等。(2)模具設計的一般方針─模具佈置、澆口、流道、排氣、頂出、模具冷卻等。(3)模具的規格：模具零件與材料、模具加工、強度與疲勞。(4) 模具性能：模具壽命、成形週期、成形品之肉厚、尺寸、形狀等。 (5)特殊成形法：共射、埋入件、氣輔、覆蓋、微射出、金屬射出、陶瓷射出等。
description.en: Mold Engineering is to familiarize not only beginners in mold design but also more experienced mold designers with an engineering approach to mold design. In addition, mold engineering is also recommended mold knowledge to any individuals, such as sales and service personnel, in the plastic industry who need to understand mold in their activities. This course is divided into four sections: (1) Basics about Mold, Injection Machine, Plastics, and Products. (2) General Mold Design Guideline: mold layout, gate, runner, venting, ejection, mold cooling. (3) Specification of the Mold: mold parts and material, mold machining, strength and fatigue. (4) Mold Performance: mold life, cycle time, wall thickness, product size and shape. (5) Special Injection Molding: Coinjection molding, Insert molding, Gas-assistant injection molding, over molding, micro injection molding, Metal injection molding, Ceramic injection molding.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的系統及方法。包括：三D工件建圖、設計計算及分析、製造實驗及分析、軟體寫作、網路、NC程式寫作、製程模擬、智慧型製程控制及優化、電腦整合製造系統。
description.en: Introducing the system and methods about computer aided design and manufacturing. Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.

description.zh: 愈來愈多的商業活動在網路上進行，蓬勃發展的電子商務，也對現有的法律與政策造成許多挑戰。本課程將對電子商務的發展做一概要介紹，其後由網路科技與智財法律的概論談起，接著以目前智財法規所面臨的議題為主，並挑選台灣與國際的知名案例，讓學生兼顧理論與實務，建立對電子商務法規與政策發展的認識。
description.en: Doing business online is more and more prevalent nowadays, nonetheless, as e-commerce activities striving rapidly, new legal challenges are calling for attention. This course will start with an introduction on the characteristics and developments of e-commerce activities, following by the exploration and discussion on relevant literature and cases. Noted that this course will focus on the intellectual property laws and make comparative studies in order to equip students with an in-depth understanding and knowledge on these issues.

name.zh: 美國專利訴訟專題研究
name.en: Special Topics on U.S. Patent Litigation

description.zh: 請見英文概述。
description.en: This course is a research-based course. Students will be exposed to various legal issues involving U.S. patent litigation. The procedural issues are mainly explored. Each student will be assigned with one research topic.

description.zh: 本課程將深入我國專利法，同時簡介美國及大陸專利法。本課程內容主要涵蓋：專利申請、可專利標的、專利要件及要求、專利審查流程、專利權之實施、專利侵害判斷、專利檢索及專利說明書之撰寫。其他內容尚包括簡介專利訴訟流程、專利行政救濟流程、法院及智慧財產局之角色以及專利法與其他智慧財產權法之關係。
description.en: This course will go through R.O.C. (Taiwan) patent law in detail, and introduce to the U.S. and China patent laws. Topics will mainly include patent filing, patentable subject matter, patent conditions and requirements, patent examination procedure, patent enforcement, patent infringement assessment, patent search, and patent drafting. Other topics include introduce to patent litigation procedure, patent administrative suit procedure, the roles of the court and the Intellectual Property Office and the relationship between patent law and other Intellectual Property laws.

description.zh: 本課程主要關注台灣專利申請的程序觀點。其相關的主題包括發明人身份、專利權人（專利申請權人）身份、優先權、申請格式、發明人訪談、審查意見答覆寫作、訴願狀寫作和專利申請策略。此外，國際專利申請的實務觀點也會在課堂上討論以做為比較。本課程教材包括專利申請教科書、各國專利申請基準、和法院判決等。
description.en: This course focuses on the procedural aspect of the patent prosecution in Taiwan. The topics cover inventorship, ownership (including a right to file a patent application), priority, formality, inventor interview, office action response drafting, petition brief drafting, and patent filing strategy.  In addition, the practical aspect of international patent prosecution is presented for comparison. The class materials include a patent prosecution textbook, patent examination guidelines from different counties, and court decisions.

description.zh: 本課主要講授民法第二編債篇的規定。債篇包括契約法和侵權行為法。相關的法律理論都會被介紹。學生將被指定閱讀教科書和法院判決。課堂參與是必要的。
description.en: This course teaches the rules of the second chapter of Civil Code. The second chapter covers contract law and torts. Relevant legal doctrines are introduced. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.

description.zh: 本課主要講授民法第三編物權篇的規定。相關的法律理論都會被介紹。學生將被指定閱讀教科書和法院判決。課堂參與是必要的。
description.en: This course teaches the rules of the third chapter of Civil Code. The third chapter defines property rights of our civil law system. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.

description.zh: 本課主要講授公司法的規定。相關的法律理論都會被介紹。學生將被指定閱讀教科書和法院判決。課堂參與是必要的。
description.en: This course teaches Company Act. Company Act covers procedural rules of incorporation, duties of a president, board members, or shareholders. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.

description.zh: 利用化學方法進行地質探勘
description.en: ntroduction to geochemical exploration

description.zh: 將試作技術課程內所習之試作技術應用發揮，以產品設計圖為依據，應用各種材料及加工技術完成產品之立體表達。
description.en: To practice product model building techniques . Based on product engineering drawing , let techning design students to practice model making techniques with difference material and working methods .

description.zh: 講授透視圖的基本原理、種類與方法及透視陰影,並以設計實例透視圖練習應用,培養靈活應用透視圖法於設計表達。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and skills of perspective drafting by specifically introducing perspective theories and ways of drawing, and being concurrent with the practice of drawing in industrial design.

description.zh: 讓學生學習電腦2D與3D軟體之技能，俾能應用於工程製圖，並配合其他各種參數式3D與材質編修電腦軟體之整合。
description.en: The study of 2D and 3D computer software which could be applied to the engineering drawing, and the integration with parametric 3D and materials edit computer software.

description.zh: 探討木材之物理及機械性質對於家具構造與製造品質之影響，並讓學生瞭解材料之組織構造以熟識家具用材之鑑定。終其目標在使學生認識材料進而善用材料。介紹以木質材料為主之家具材料。內容含蓋木材之外觀特徵，組織構造，材料鑑識及其物理與機械性質對於家具構造和製造品質其間之關係等。
description.en: The macrostructure and microstructure of wood. Identification and uses of common Softwoods and Hardwoods. Physical and mechanical properties in relation to wood processing. Properties of other wood based materials such as particleboard, fiberboard, plywood, laminated wood related to their use in furniture manufacture also included.

description.zh: (一)嘗試引導同學作相關設計研究，探索符合社會、人文的設計策略，以國際消費者趨勢、競爭者分析、科技趨勢、國際設計研究為依據，用清晰的思路作不同的市場定位。(二)培養同學觀察市場，了解資訊。以一設計師應有能力，發展出利基性產品的關鍵性因素分析報告。並探索不同族群之消費行為分析，作為加速產品開發流程及建立利基性產品之依據，可爭取商機及最大利潤。(三) 每位同學需完成團隊分析報告，與授課老師指定之其他作業。
description.en: This course aims to help students to develop analysis skills on design trends in global context, including the sensibility and judgment of design style, design service, and design industry. Assignments include case studies other required reports.

description.zh: 生活空間設計實務與管理訓練。課程主旨在於培養學生對於室內設計實際工務執行與專案管理之能力，尤重： 1. 施工與估價, 2.室內設計技術規範兩大議題。其中，施工與估價部分強調設計者對於室內設計工程管理之了解，並熟練室內工程之成本分析及數量計算之方法與要點。室內設計技術規範部分則強調設計者應有的對於室內裝修設計與工程相關法規的掌握，如：建築法(與室內裝修有關的部份)、建築技術規則(與室內裝修有關的部份)、建築物室內裝修管理辦法(最主要的)、公寓大廈管理辦法、消防法、勞工安全衛生管理辦法、各類場所消防安全設備設置標準、公共工程品質管理辦法、營造業法、廢棄物清潔管理辦法等。
description.en: Training in the management and the practice of an interior design project. The course aims to equip students with the competence of managing a design project from ideality to reality that stresses especially two sections: 1. the construction and the estimation, and 2. the codes and regulations for the practice of an interior design project. The first section aims to acquaint the student with the management skill of construction, and the techniques of pricing the project including materials, labor, overhead and the administrative expenses. The second section is to enable students to understand and apply the codes and regulations for interior decoration and construction. For example, Building Code (the articles concerning interior decoration), Building Technical Regulations(the articles concerning interior decoration), Regulations for the Management of Building Interior Decoration and Repairs(the primary), Apartment Building Regulations, Fire Act, Labor Safety and Health Law, Standard fo

notes: 家室組,四設三四和四創意三合開

description.zh: 從展示空間之規劃過程讓學生了解規劃的基礎概念及空間設計之實務，以達到展示之最佳效果，例如施工設計、色彩、照明、空間結構、展示佈置以及櫥窗設計等展示效果。
description.en: This course develops the students understanding of the exhibition design process and practical experience such as lighting, coloring, space structure, arrangement and construction, and show window design.

notes: 家室組,四設三和四創意三合開

description.zh: 使修習者對於大地工程有基本認識，應用土壤力學理論於工程實務。
description.en: This course introduce the design considerations of some fundamental and simple geotechnical structures based on the application of soil mechanics, with practical exercise. A series of design tasks for slope protection, including retaining wall, cut and drainage, anchors are  requested.

notes: 四材三乙及四材四乙合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹水文地質的一般原理、概念和分析方法及地下水在實用上的一些問題。主要內容有: 水的來、源分、佈與循環、地下水的賦存、地下水的物理性質及化學成分、地下水運動的基本規律、地下的地質作用、地下水的補給、排泄與徑流、地下水資源概況，與地下水有關的環境問題，地下水與工程開發的工程地質問題，水文地質調查概要等。
description.en: The content of this class includes general principles, concepts of hydrological geology and analyzing methods for practical problem related to this subject. It includes: origin of water, distribution and circulation, reserve of underground water, physical and chemical properties of underground water and the relationship between hydrology and engineering geology.  It also discuss environmental concerns of engineering to the hydrology system.

notes: 四材三乙及四材四乙合開

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。曲軸沖床、各單元件之設計與構造要點、剪斷原理與過程、變形原理、成形現象、引伸原理、力的分析、設計實例、連續引伸的設計程序。
description.en: Structure and design Fundamental element of craft, punching, principle and process of steaming cutting, principles of deformation, forming phenomena, design and manufacturing process of continuous stretching.

notes: 四機三乙和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 學習"邏輯推理"主要的目的便是幫助我們培養一種邏輯能力，使我們能夠為我們的人生做出正確的判斷。本課程包括:邏輯的基本觀念，真值表推論法，語句邏輯中自然演繹法的18條基本推論規則，語句邏輯的基本公理系統，量化邏輯中自然演繹法的基本規論推測，量化邏輯的詮釋方法，量化邏輯的基本公理系統，語句邏輯的後設理論，量化邏輯的後設理論，傳統的三段論法，謬誤理論、與介於自然與形式語言之間的翻譯等等。
description.en: The main purpose of studying "Logical Inference" is to help us obtain a kind of logical ability, by means of which we will be able to make right choices for our life.  This courses covers at least the following topics: basic ideas in logic, the truth table method, 18 basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in sentential logic, basic axiomatic systems in sentential logic, basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in quantificational logic, interpretations in quantificational logic, basic axiomatic systems in quantificational logic, meta-theorem in sentential logic, meta-theorem in quantificational logic, traditional syllogism, the fallacy theory, and the translation between natural and formal language, etc.

description.zh: 現代科技文明進展得非常迅速，這使得一般人日常生活中，可能經常享受到這些科技所帶來的便利，但卻習以為常，以為天生下來就是這樣的，這些現代的科技，可能是關於電機的、物理的、化工的、光電的、材料的......，更有可能同時涉及了其他許多個領域，更可能有許多人希望能夠了解這些科技的來龍去脈，一窺其究竟，人類在沒有土木工程學之前，早已能建築萬里長城和金字塔，許許多多的科技是由嘗試錯誤，經驗的累積逐漸得來的，當然，隨著知識的不斷窮究其理，"知而後行"的高科技也就會越來越多，我們在這裡也試圖去追蹤各項科技的演進史與現況方面讓大家知道羅馬不是一天所造成的，另一方面也讓大家有從另一個角度重新思考的機會，也許這些科技進化到現在，還稱不上成熟的階段，您也許可以找出另一種更好的方法來改進它們！
description.en: Modern technology is growing fast. People thus enjoy the convenience in company with the technology—which they do and they just take it for granted to do. It may have something to do with electrical engineering, physics, chemical engineering, electro-optical engineering, materials…Some problems involves more than one field. People are curious about the technology and willing to know how to solve the problems. Human beings are able to build the pyramids and the Long Walls before they know anything about civil engineering—knowledge actually piled up by trial and error or accumulated experience. As knowledge expands, hi-end technology which requires “know-how” becomes more popular. In this course, we try to trace the history and the current situations: “Rome was not built in a day.” On the other hand, we might take another chance to RE-think a deeper problem: technology evolves without getting to maturity. Human beings will be enforced to find some other ways to improve it.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

description.zh: 台灣的歷史從無文字傳統的原住民起，到17世紀西班牙、荷蘭海上競逐開始，漢人隨之移墾台灣，成為這塊土地最主要的住民。本課程的內容將依時間先後，將荷蘭西班牙殖民時期、鄭氏王國、清代台灣、日治時期與國民政府時期重要歷史大事、人物等依據講義講解，內容有政治、宗教、文化、經濟、社會等各層面的重要事件、人物以及歷史發展。
description.en: The history of Taiwan originated from the aboriginal culture in which no written languages were included. In the 17th century when the Spanish and the Netherlands were competing for the maritime power, the Hans immigrated into the island and became the main resident. The course will be taught in the temporal order: colonial periods under the Spanish and the Netherlands, Zheng's Kingdom, Taiwan under the Qing Dynasty, Taiwan under the Japanese Domination and Taiwan under the Nationalist Government. All the significant events and important figures will be discussed in class--on politics, religion, culture, economy and social development.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

description.zh: 多元文化不僅是當今世界的主流人文思維，也代表一種普世價值觀，更是全球人類彼此互動往來--地球村的基調。這門課主要是引導學生探討文化的意義，以及文化史的內涵，希望在有限的時間內，重點式的的介紹世界各主要國家的文化特色，經由對異文化的認識與比較，能夠協助學生建立較寬闊而多元的文化認知及價值取向。
description.en: Multi-culture is emerging as the mainstream field of humanities, involving not only a representation of universalism but also an interwoven tapestry of cross-cultural communication, which forms the fundamental structure of a global village. This course is to inspire students to search for the meaning of distinct cultures as well as the essence of cultural.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

description.zh: 本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en: This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.
