name.en: Seminar in Intellectual Property Right Cases

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過案例研析介紹智慧財產權之理論與實務問題。課程進行的方式是邀請學界或實務界專家學者，以演講的方式講解相關智慧財產權案例所涉法律問題，並安排參訪智慧財產權實務單位（如專利事務所、智慧財產局、智慧財產法院等），讓同學們得以一窺智慧財產權實務工作的全貌，以達實務與理論相輔相成的功效。
description.en: The course offers introduction to the practice and theory knowledge of Intellectual Property by case study . The course is conducted through lectures of practical subject . It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the practice of Intellectual Property is performed in our country .

description.zh: 以傳統與革新的觀點探究技職教育方案評鑑的理論與實務，包括專有名詞、評鑑的規劃、評鑑取向、評鑑標準、評鑑倫理、評鑑人員、資料蒐集分析與解釋的方法、評鑑結果的報告及後設評鑑等相關議題。
description.en: Exploring the program evaluation theory and practice from both traditional and innovative point of view on Technical-Vocational Education, including: design evaluation plans, evaluation ethics, evaluation standard, evaluator, design tools for collecting data, conduct observations and interviews, interpret data, write reports, provide assistance in communicating findings to various stakeholder groups, and metaevaluation.

description.zh: 本課程介紹網路行銷各種重點技巧，包括社群行銷與、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學有網路創業與行銷的實務規劃之能力。
description.en: As a business owner, it is essential to understand the different options and technologies available. Using Internet marketing you have the following benefits 1.Less costly compare to traditional advertising media 2.Increased exposure, no geographic boundary for Internet users 3.More personalized ads 4.More targeted audience 5.More accurate as it can be updated timely with minimal effort and cost 6.Easier to collect and track customer information.

notes: 四工四甲乙和最後一哩合開,限160人

description.zh: 本課程引入生活性的學習方法來誘發學生學習動機，並培養可在社會與職場運用的四項英文基本技能。課程目標在幫助學生在生活實境習得英文，為他們裝備可溝通表達於日常、社交活動，並提升職涯的整合性英文技能。每堂課程都注重在以學生為中心的學習活動中帶入全真、應用性高的英文技巧。課程設計涵蓋的功能包括課堂分享與作業、日常互動英文以及專業英文練習。主要課題包括溝通，簡報與談判技巧，應用閱讀與寫作，聽力技巧運用，語言與文化。
description.en: This course introduces real-world based learning approaches for students to raise their learning aspirations and to develop four essential English skills that are applicable in social and professional encounters. This course aims to help students practice English in most real-life settings and to equip them with integrated skills to advance their careers. Every class session focuses on bringing authentic and applied English in student-centered leaning activities. The class design covers the functions like information sharing and task-based activities, social interactions, and professional English practices. Essential topics include communication, techniques of negotiation and presentation, applied reading and writing, strategies for developing listening skills and language learning across cultures.

name.en: Aesthetics Approach to Architecture and Environment

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋建築美學和環境美學兩大部分，旨在培養學生建築與環境的美學鑑賞力與美感能力、最終能對建築專業有所提升。課程分為四部分：1 中西方美學知識論2 建築美學發展脈絡3 環境美學發展脈絡4 當前建築美學課題與專業的啟發
description.en: This course is about Aesthetics approach to Architecture and Environmen that is aimed to establish connoisseurship on architecture and environment, and therefore enhance ability toward design practice. The class includes four parts:1 The Aesthetics epistemology   2 The context of Architectural aesthetics3 the context of Environmental aesthetics4 Contemporary issues on aesthetics inspirations from the professionals.

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。 2、智慧化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、智慧建築標章之介紹。4、智慧建築之資通訊應用。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。 6、智慧型建築之設施管理。7、智慧建築之健康舒適。8、智慧建築之節能管理 9、智慧建築之安全防災。10、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3. Introduction of intelligent building  label  4. ITC applicationins in intelligent building 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building 7. Healthy and comfortable for intelligent building  8. Energy saving management of intelligent building  9. Safety and disaster prevention for intelligent building 10.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

description.zh: 設計專業用進階德文；設計專業德文導讀及加強德文的聽、說、讀、寫能力，概念理解及溝通設計用之德文。
description.en: The alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of advanced German to building the capability of reading, speaking, writing and understanding the design advanced German.

description.zh: 介紹陶瓷材料、不同成型技法、釉藥知識及燒窯過程。在課堂實習手捏成型、圈條成型、拉坏成型等多種不同成型方法及表面設計應用在陶瓷作品之練習。
description.en: This course aims to develop student's potential in ceramics and pottery making, and to encourage a practical and theoretical understanding of skills and techniques of pottery making process.

notes: 四設三(需修過陶瓷創作一)

description.zh: 1.照明光源及燈具介紹：白熾燈、螢光燈、弧光燈、LED燈2.輻射度學、光度學、色度學之基本物理概念與單位3.照明光度學之量測方法與儀器介紹4.點光源之照度計算 5.多光源之平均照度計算 6.照度之品質與評價7.幾何光學：折射、反射、全反射、散射、材料色散、吸收、螢光激發 8.LED的發光原理與特性指標：顏色、效率、壽命、光形、光譜、熱散 9.白光LED的特徵：色溫、演色性 10.LED光源的封裝與二次光學透鏡
description.en: 1.(Lighting Luminaire: Incandescent Lamp, Fluorescent Lamp, High Intensity Discharge lamp, LED Lamp)2.concepts and Units of Radiometry/Photometry/Colorimetry3.Photometry Test Method and Understanding Test Report4.Calcuating Illuminance at a Point5.Average illuminance Calculation6.Quantity and Quality of Illumination7.Geometric optics8.Characteristics of LED 9.White light LED Characteristics: CCT and CRI10.Optical package and Secondary optics for LED

notes: 四光四.光電所和最後一哩合開,限8人

notes: 四光四.光電所和最後一哩合開,限7人

description.zh: 對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力系統控制，系統保護。
description.en: Symmetrical components, unbalanced fault, generator model, stability, voltage control system, power system control,

description.zh: 培養學生具有對於現今專利法規、申請審查、專利說明書及其撰寫的相關認識，將專利權的概念植入研發精神中，進而運用於其研究計畫之先前規劃及研究方向之擬定上，縮短學術研究與產業應用的落差，並以專利權來保護研發成果。課程內容：如何分析一份專利文件，親自撰寫一份好的專利說明書，如何作專利組合規劃，瞭解專利申請的每一程序。
description.en: Want to protect the achievement of researching and developing with the patent right, the most important condition is to write a suitable patent specification. This course aims at letting students understand: How to analyze a patent document; How to write a good patent specification; How to make the patent portfolio planning; Understand each procedure of application for patent.

notes: 四機三甲和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 電腦軟體為資訊時代不可或缺之基本元素。為保護撰寫電腦程式者之創作結晶，惟有依賴相關之智慧財產權之保護。然而，專利權之保護不同於其它智慧財產權,須經一定的標準審查與核准，才能獲得專利法所授予之保護。本課程將介紹此專利法下，相關電腦軟體之規定。
description.en: Computer software is one of the essential elements in the information age. Software programmers can protect their endeavors and creativity only rely on relevant laws related to intellectual property. In regarding to the patent protection for computer software, the criteria for patent grants are much different from other IP laws. Thus course will introduce these rules related to patent grants.

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 網路資源運用是現代人生的一部份，但不當利用網路或為犯罪工具的例子屢見不鮮，本課程擬探討網路誹謗、網路色情、駭客攻擊以及網路交際的安全性等，期望在個案的討論中培養學生正確利用網路資源的觀念，進一步落實法治教育。
description.en: To use internet resources is already part of the life for every modern people; however, the cases of using internet as the criminal tool are not rare. Thus, this course is going to discuss the law issues that are spread out from the application of internet, which including: internet slander, internet pornography. Hacker attack and electronic bank, electronic shopping, electronic business. Hope we can help our students to develop the right conception to use internet resources through case study, and further more to carry out the law education.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures.  And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity.  The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 本科目旨在探討人們的選擇行為，亦即如何利用有限的資源，以滿足人類無限的慾望。個體經濟學著眼於價格機能之方析，範圍涵蓋：消費者行為、廠商理論、各種市場的結構分析、以及公共部門的決策。
description.en: Economics explores choice behavior of human beings. Especially, it concerns how people make choice in order to satisfy their unlimited desire under limited resources. Microeconomics focuses on the analysis of price mechanism which involves consumer behavior, firms' decision making, structure of various markets, and public sector.

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解多國企業所面對的國際財務管理的議題、其理論及實務。內容包括外匯市場、國際套利、外匯衍生性商品、外匯風險暴露管理、境外市場及國際投資組合管理。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand the theory and practice of the international financial management issues faced by multinational corporations. The course includes the following topics: foreign exchange, foreign exchange arbitrage, foreign exchange derivatives, risk exposure management, offshore market, and the international portfolio management.

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解服務業管理相關的實務作法。
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers. The students will have a clear service management operation by well-selected case study.

name.en: Doctoral Seminar on Theories of Multinational Enterprises

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在於讓學生瞭解國際企業的主要研究領域與研究方向，故本課程首先會向同學介紹國際企業研究領域中的主流思維，讓同學瞭解國際企業的性質、型態、發展趨勢與行為模式等。此外，本課程的主要目的，是希望同學能學習到如何將國際企業理論研究的主流思維，結合運用至自己的研究當中。希望博士生於修習本課程後，能夠對於國際企業的領域有更入的瞭解，並能培養出獨立研究的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce students to key areas of research in International Business studies. This course will review the current major theoretical thoughts on the scholar studies of international business, focusing on the nature, patterns, trends, and behavior of transnational corporations.The main objective of this course is then to provide students with an understanding of main currents of thoughts in this area and the abilities in incorporating these thoughts for research in a coherent way. This exercise will aid Ph.D. students in learning about theories of mutinational enterprises, and getting a feel for independent research in IB fields.

notes: 博士班課程,碩士生欲修習須經授課教師同意後方可

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹組織管理的各項重要研究議題，包括人力資源管理、組織行為以及組織理論等。此外，本課程也將介紹諸多有關組織管理研究方法的議題。
description.en: This course introduces many research topics of organizational management, including the topics regarding human resource management (HRM), organizational behavior (OB), and organizational theory (OT). In addition, we will discuss many issues regarding the research methods in organization studies.

notes: 博士班課程,碩士生欲修習須經授課教師同意後方可

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生了解整合行銷傳播整體概念，強調行銷傳播工像是廣告、公關、事件活動行銷等等的重要性及運用性，輔以實務個案架構；經由整合行銷個案實例，將整合行銷傳播運用詳加介紹。課堂中經由個案架構互動討論，達成理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with knowledge and understanding of the concept of integrated marketing communications and how it can be made to work effectively within an organization. A clear understanding of the principles and practice will develop student ability to analyze the marketing environment and specific marketing problems, create solutions to integrated marketing problems and apply appropriate marketing techniques across a range of market sectors.

description.zh: 講授各種電機機械的工作原理及特性，內容包含：磁路分析、變壓器、旋轉電機原理、直流機、多相感應馬達、單相感應馬達、同步機、伺服及步進馬達。
description.en: To teach the principles and characteristics of electrical machinery, this course includes the subjects of analysis of magnetic circuits, transformers, principles of rotating electric machinery, direct-current machines, multiple-phase induction motors, single-phase induction motors, synchronous machines, servo and step motors.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     創新設計之意涵，創新設計之方法，創新設計之個案研究，智慧財產權之維護。
description.en: Meaning of Creative Design, Methods of Creative Design, Case study of Creative Design,      Protection of Intellectual Properties.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001051或負責教授同意。本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

name.zh: 國際觀培養-越南文化與語言Ⅱ
name.en: Development of global perspective:Vietnam culture and languageⅡ

description.zh: 課程以培養基礎越南語溝通能力、激發學習越南語興趣為宗旨。課程架構由發音學習開始，以奠定良好基礎，並以基礎語法與簡單對話為目標，培養學生越南語簡易聽、說、讀、寫能力。另外，結合多元化議題討論，增進其認識越南文化特色及台灣與越南經貿往來之現況，使其具備越南商務基本實力。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with the ability to communicate in Vietnamese and to stimulate students' interest. The course will start with the teaching of pronunciation and followed by basic grammar and simple conversation. Students are expected to have the ability to speak, listen, read and write. Furthermore, we will be discussing cross-cultural topics in our course. It is hoped that students can be familiar with Vietnamese culture and the current situation of economic and trade exchanges between Vietnam and Taiwan.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家特別是東協五國經濟成長迅速，藉由傳授東南亞四小語以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖並促進台灣與東南亞國家之間的經貿關係。本課程旨在培養學生的基本溝通能力，運用馬來語來與當地馬來母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries.This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

notes: 四土四乙和最後一哩合開,限30人

name.zh: 國際專業證照研訓實務進階講座
name.en: Practice Advance Seminar of International Professional Certification

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本國際專業證照研訓實務進階講座課程針對國際性專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國際專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。本學期專門培訓學生通過Microsoft 國際證照之PowerPoint 與Access為目標，以協助同學同時取得Microsoft大師級證照。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices advance of international professional licenses in business and management, nurture students to participate in international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate international professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation. This semester will help students to pass the licenses of PowerPoint and Access, and further to obtain the master license.

notes: 四管三和最後一哩合開,限50人

name.zh: 國際觀培養-國際商業脈動
name.en: Feast for the global perspective —Global Business Trends

description.zh: 本課程藉由台灣企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以台灣企業品牌之實際案例，能讓台灣企業與年輕學子能由認識自己所屬國家的奮鬥過程，才能更進一步的追求國際觀，追求更廣闊的國際視野。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real examples, business manager will make students learn further about the Taiwan brand and innovation and creation thinking. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 四管二.經管所和最後一哩合開,限300人,周二ABC上課

description.zh: 本課程主旨在介紹一個企業集團如何創業、擴充事業版圖、多角化經營。企業永續成長與經營的目標，端賴於管理階層具有前瞻性地視野、敏銳的策略規劃、健全的管理制度與人力資源充分有效的發揮。課程進行是以演講的方式介紹該集團各事業體相關之營運情形，讓同學們得以一窺業界實務工作的全貌，以達實務與理論相輔相成的功效。
description.en: The goals of perpetual management and growth of an enterprise are depend upon the top level of vision, lean thinking and strategy planning, organization system integration, and manpower resource effective utilization. The objective of this course is to introduce the practice application and manage a business group.

notes: 四管二.經管所和最後一哩合開,周三ABC上課

name.zh: 財經專業證照進階講座
name.en: Advance Seminar of Finance and Economic Professional Certification

description.zh: 為加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本財經專業證照進階講座，針對金融市場常識與職業道德與理財規劃人員課程，希望學生能夠學習基本的金融市場常識與金融從業人員應具備的職業道德，並進一步瞭解理財的流程，同時就個人或家庭的收支、儲蓄、住屋、子女教育、以及退休生活等規劃皆予明確分析，並舉實際案例詳予說明並闡釋各種相關理財金融機構之角色與功能，逐一介紹各類理財工具之特性及其有效之運用方法。對於未來有志從事金融機構財富管理業務之從業人員及大專院校財金系所學生，極適合作為其日常業務之參考、進修或準備應試之用。以培育學生參加並通過國內外財經專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the advance seminar of professional licenses in finance and economics, nurture students to participate in professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate finance and economics professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

description.zh: 課程以培養基礎越南語溝通能力、激發學習越南語興趣為宗旨。課程架構由發音學習開始，以奠定良好基礎，並以基礎語法與簡單對話為目標，培養學生越南語簡易聽、說、讀、寫能力。另外，結合多元化議題討論，增進其認識越南文化特色及台灣與越南經貿往來之現況，使其具備越南商務基本實力。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with the ability to communicate in Vietnamese and to stimulate students' interest. The course will start with the teaching of pronunciation and followed by basic grammar and simple conversation. Students are expected to have the ability to speak, listen, read and write. Furthermore, we will be discussing cross-cultural topics in our course. It is hoped that students can be familiar with Vietnamese culture and the current situation of economic and trade exchanges between Vietnam and Taiwan.

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授土木文化資產基本知識，培育工程與文化資產兼備之人才，以發揚文化資產之價值，提升我國文化層次及文明水準。透過授課、參訪及研究以培育文化資產之技術從業及學術研究人才，以加強文化資產之發掘、維護、保存及活化等作業內涵，促進其相關之學術、技術及技藝活動，以發揮文化資產相對價值，進而提升我國文明水準。
description.en: The course aims to develop an awareness of the diversity of issues related to civil engineering cultural assets and to nurture engineers with both engineering and cultural backgrounds so as to enhance the levels of cultural and civilization of our society. Through visits and lectures, students will be able to learn the historical development of civil engineering; the maintenance, preservation and revitalization of surviving historical civil engineering assets; and to appreciate and foster cultural assets.

name.en: Multimedia Service in Heterogeneous Network Environment

description.zh: 本課程介紹異質多網多媒體的特性與架構，包含：有線及無線網路的內容介紹，以及整合有線及無線網路成為異質網路的概念，其中將針對IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH)教導學生針對異質網路垂直切換的原理及技術。最後，對於多媒體服務技術及原理做介紹，包含：VoIP服務以及視訊串流服務的介紹，以及如何針對 多種異質網路整合多媒體服務的介紹，藉此提升學生對於新世代異質多網多媒體服務之認識。
description.en: This course introduces the characteristics and architecture of multimedia service in heterogeneous network environment. First, wired and wireless networks, e.g., 3G/3.5G/4G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and other popular wireless access techniques, would be introduced one by one. Then, by describing the theory and technology of IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH), this course would show how to integrate multiple different networks into heterogeneous network environments and how to handoff among them. Finally, regarding multimedia service, VoIP and video streaming services would be taken into consideration. This course would introduce how to provide multimedia services over heterogeneous network environment. Therefore, students can learn the next-generation techniques about multimedia services in heterogeneous network environment from this course.

description.zh: 透過下列授課方式由學生自己彙整出各種學習方法以具備進入職場再學習之能力1.閱讀學習相關書籍後之心得分享與討論2.授課老師之企業轉型經驗分享3.探討企業轉型實例並分析組織學習能力與轉型績效之關係
description.en: 英文概述English Description 	This course is to discuss and summarize learning skills to well prepare students in professional envioronments.It includes (1) discussion and reviews in related reading assignments; (2) experience sharing from experts in industries; (3) case analysis and study in the relation between learning skills and performance in organization level.

description.zh: 此門課程的主要目標，將介紹數位多媒體晶片設計，讓學生對於數位多媒體晶片設計有深入的認識與了解，進而產生濃厚的興趣與設計能力。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in digital multimedia IC design. The outline of this course is given as follows. 1. Introduction 2. Digital IC Design3. Color Science4. Multimedia System   a. Image and Video Coding  b. State-of-the-art Image and Video Coding Standards (industry)  c. 3D Video System  d. Holographic System5. Multimedia IC Design Methodology

description.zh: 課程主要藉由Rhinoceros曲面軟體之泛用性，針對產品外觀造形設計之實務需求、學習正確之曲面軟體建模技巧與觀念、並能應用在其它相關設計領域；幫助學生創意發想與造型創作不設限，並大大縮短產品開發時程並提升工作效率。
description.en: To be an effective designer today, you need tools to quickly develop your designs and accurately communicate them to everyone in the product research, development, marketing, and manufacturing or construction process. This course introduces the computer aided modeling design，teach students how to use Rhinoceros software to create accurately and high quality surface model and document your designs ready for rendering, animation, drafting, engineering, analysis, and manufacturing or construction.

description.zh: 介紹產品開發的流程與工作的內容，運用產學合作模式，輔導學生實際參與和體驗產業界之產品開發專案，訓練學生團隊合作與問題解決能力。
description.en: Introduce Product develop process and C-flow , guide and help students ' active ,training their team work capability , independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

description.zh: 本課程探討處理空間資料的模式與演算法則，主題包含: (1) 空間資料庫介紹與應用, (2) 空間概念與資料模式, (3) 空間搜尋語言, (4) 空間資料儲存與索引, (5) 搜尋處理與最佳化, (6) 空間網路, (7) 空間資料庫的研究趨勢。
description.en: This course studies the models and algorithms for the efficient handling of data related to space. The topics include: (1) Introduction to Spatial Databases, (2) Spatial Concepts and Data Models, (3) Spatial Query Languages, (4) Spatial Storage and Indexing, (5) Query Processing and Optimization, (6) Spatial Networks, and (7) Trends on Spatial Databases.

name.zh: 創新講座--文化生活創意

description.zh: 本課程係提供本校學生與創意界交流的平台，提供學生建立人文藝術相關之涵養，並協助學生體驗文化生活創意之實務過程，透過邀請國內著名之文化生活創意相關之產、官、學界專家進行專題講座，經由專家之經驗分享與傳承，以激發學生透過自身生活之經驗學習創意發展之可能性，開發其創意之潛能。
description.en: Course Description：    This course provide a platform to generate between student and creativity. It could students to build the temperament of human arts, and experience practical process of cultural life creativity. Through the invitation of the cultural life creative expert in production, official, education to have a speech. By the way of sharing and passing down, it could stimulate the learning creative develop possibility of students in their daily life, and develop the potential of creativity.

description.zh: 「室內設計就業規畫」的課程目標旨在提供學生未來從事室內設計相關工作的就業與創業準備。課程邀請產業界主管或負責人，透過專題演講、企業參訪、校外教學等方式，教授學生室內設計相關就業與創業知識與實務經驗。
description.en: The aim of「Interior Design Career Plan」is to provide students knowledge for participating in the interior design or related industry in the near future. By means of lectures, visiting specific places, the course invites leading entrepreneurs and directors from interior design firms to share their knowledge and experience.

notes: 四設三和最後一哩合開,一34,限30人,已修習室內設計

description.zh: (1)熟悉3D塑膠產品設計；(2)學會應用2D與3D軟體的操作模具設計與拆模；(3)射出成形模具的構造元件之規格與設計；(4)模具零件分解圖；(5)模具組立圖。
description.en: (1) To realize the 3D plastic molding part's design. (2)Mold design and dissolution by 3D CAD software. (3) Injection mold parts design and specification. (4) The explosion diagram of mold parts. (5) Injection mold assembly.

notes: 四機三甲和最後一哩合開,限30人

name.en: District heating and cooling system  technology

description.zh: 區域冷暖房系統，係指將大型區域或特定建築物群之空調系統加以整合規劃，把供應空調所需之冰水主機、鍋爐及發電機等重大設備，統籌集中於一主機中，利用共通管路輸送冷、暖氣及熱水至各使用地區。由於空調系統經過整合，各區空調需求之參差因數可互補，故系統互通效應更高，冰水主機或鍋爐容量可大為降低，其次本系統作為工廠廢熱、垃圾焚化發電以及供給大學校園電力，冷氣與暖氣、溫水等，皆能到達總耗能效率80%以上。
description.en: All district energy systems have four basic components: a fuel source, the central production plant, a distribution network, and its connected customers. Typically the thermal energy is used for space hearing, space cooling, or process needs and when combined with the production of electricity in central plant is also considered to be a cogeneration  facility. Combined heating, cooling and power generation in a single facility can offer attractive investment returns with lower capital costs than other alternatives.

description.zh: 本課程介紹現有無線區域網路規格的多工存取層及實體層，並深入解說規格中所使用通訊技術的原理，如載波偵測多工－避免碰撞通訊協定，正交分頻多工調變技術。
description.en: This course contains the medium access control layer(MAC) and physical layer(PHY) of the mose recent IEEE 802.11 standards for wireless local area networks. Thechniques employed by the standards, e.g.,craier sense multiple access/collision avoidance (CSMA/CA),orthogonal frequency-division multiplexing (OFDA), will be discussed in details.

notes: 電通所和電資國際班合開,1鐘點

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language

description.zh: 1. 在臺灣與東南亞交流日益增加的情況下，東南亞語言的學習需求也會隨之提高。而「泰國」所擁有的社會經濟條件優勢，以及泰國政府有意推動的文化創意產業，相信也將為臺灣帶來一陣「泰語學習風潮」。2. 課程以培養基礎泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通基本實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。3. 泰語教學方面，秉持聽、說、讀、寫同時並進的教學理念，由字母的發音、寫法、唸法、聲調、順序及拼字系統的學習開始，奠定良好的泰語基礎，搭配最常用的單字、句型、文法與日常實用會話，使學生可以拼寫、閱讀泰文短文，並能以泰語進行日常對話。4. 泰國文化方面，以專題的方式，講述政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史與文化等各個層面的泰國，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確認識及態度。本學期先針對泰國目前的經濟與文化面進行概說；下學期則探討泰國歷史、地理、政治與社會。
description.en: 1. With the interaction between Taiwan and Southeast Asia getting more and more frequent, the need for learning Southeast Asian languages has been highly increasing. Thailand owns the advantages of social economy; moreover, Thailand government intends to promote cultural creativity industries. Hence, learning Thai definitely becomes a new trend in Taiwan.2. This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking basic Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc.3. In terms of learning Thai, listening, speaking, reading and writing, these four skills are equally important. Student will be trained to learn all these four skills together. At first, s

name.zh: 國際觀培養:印尼文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective:Indonesian culture and language

description.zh: 為了迎接全球化的亞洲國家與東南亞國家之間的經濟發展,藉由傳授印尼語言,讓學生掌握印尼語同時也了解印尼文化作為兩國的經濟橋樑，以此來協助學生前往印尼就業。本課程是培養學生的溝通能力，以運用印尼語來跟印尼母語者打招呼、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to teach Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia) and equip students not only with the language but also to understand the culture as an economic bridge between the two countries. And, it is hoped that assisting students in employment in Indonesia. This course will aim to help students to develop communication skills by utilizing Indonesian language to speak to native speakers in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, and descriptive usage…etc.

notes: 限30人,四光四和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進，如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：市場導向、客戶分析與價值創造、競爭者分析與競爭地位、策略執行與績效衡量。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics are as follows: Market Orientation, Customer Analysis and Value Creation, Competitor Analysis and Competitive Position, Strategy Implementation and Performance Metrics.

description.zh: 本課程教授商品化實務概念並由學生實際操作，如何以一貫作業完成市場銷售商品。由消費者洞察開始，教導學生如何從消費者行為找到需求，進而思考產品設計動機。設計過程中涵蓋專利，製造與營運思維，最後以實際商品設計呈現。
description.en: The purpose of this course is study the concept of commercialization and how to sale the products to marketing through the consistent process.It’ll ask student to find the consumer's requirements from observation, then think and confirm the design purpose. The design process will include patent, manufacture, operating thinking, and commodity design.

notes: 四設四.創新所和最後一哩合開,限10人,有修課限制

The design process will include patent, manufacture, operating thinking, and commodity design.

description.zh: 軟體在其整個生命週期中要維持「健康」，必須要能確保需求做對(Right)、品質做好(Good)、以及使用上可被依恃 (Dependable)。在軟體工程領域中，軟體生命週期管理(Software Lifecycle Management, SLM)是確保軟體健康的具體作法。本課程將涵蓋軟體昇命週期管理的主要議題、實務作法、與工具，並以案例具體說明。1	軟體的生命週期2	軟體生命週期管理的挑戰3	軟體生命週期管理實務作法4	軟體生命週期管理平台與工具5	軟體生命週期管理案例
description.en: To ensure that software stays healthy through its lifetime, the development team must work to guarantee that the requirements are correctly implemented, that software quality is good, and that the software product is dependable in its use. Software lifecycle management seeks to bring forward such guarantees. In this course, the main issues, challenges, best practices, tool supports, and some illuminating case studies are covered.1	Software lifecycle management2	Challenges of software lifecycle management3	Best practices for software lifecycle management4	Platforms and tool supports for software lifecycle           management5	Case studies

name.zh: 文化創意發展趨勢與機會
name.en: Tendency and Opportunity of Culture and Creativity Development

description.zh: 本課程將針對「文化」與「創意」兩大部分，讓學生認識文化產業與創意產業的整體架構與範疇，同時探討台灣與各國之文創產業發展與現況，讓學生得以將學術知識轉化為實務運作之技能。    本課程將以文化與創意知識傳遞配合故事工作坊之設計，使文化與創意利用故事模式與角色原型在產品設計、品牌加值的流程而連接到自我與地域環境的關係。並透過分組的專案執行，共同發掘問題、解決問題，在過程中得到有意義的跨領域學習。
description.en: This course mainly focuses on two aspects, "culture" and "creativity", and aims at helping students to cognize the structure and categories of culture industry, also investigating industrial development and current status in Taiwan and worldwide, further enables students to transform the academic knowledge into professional practice. The course will deliver culture and creativity knowledge through story workshops, utilizing narration pattern and character archetype to the process of designing products and branding, further connecting the knowledge to the relationship between self and regional environment. Students will be divided into groups, discover and solve problems together through executing a project, and obtain meaningful interdisciplinary learning experience.

notes: 四文二和最後一哩合開

name.zh: 空間設計形式構成研究

description.zh: 從文化與歷史的觀點，看空間形式生成的歷程；從前人創作的結果，探究形式設計的創新門徑。本課程以人類生活空間包含器物、室內空間、建築外部、公共景觀設施等所呈現的各種形式構成為研究目標，回溯既往，以為創新。
description.en: To learn from the past, to build innovative creation on historical heritage, the course analyses aesthetic components from existing masterpieces in order to inspire ideas for innovative design work. Case studies are guided to investigate on 'form' appeared in our surrounding including interior space, furniture, architecture, infrastructure and landscape.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師涂菀凌,北大三峽校區商學院1F01博雅選修文學

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師林子晴,北大三峽校區商學院1F01博雅選修文學

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師賴淑芳,醫大3101教室博雅選修文學

description.zh: 本課程為一門加強思考能力的工具課。藉由探索如何思考的過程，體會到同理心的在創作與創新過程中的重要。其最終目標為培養學生與未來社會接軌與形塑的能力與成為未來所需要的人才做準備。從實際體驗的課程中，學員可以了解設計思考的歷程，並將Design Thinkning 活用在生活的基礎。配合國內外成功典範研究，以強化同理心與培養洞見的習慣。課程的特色著重跨領域知識方法論的互補與異同之討論，並以人文科學的方法為以人為本的設計奠定基礎，進而使學生能將創作超越媒材熟練度，涵蓋了以地方經驗所淬煉出來的普世價值。
description.en: If you would like to develop your thinking skills, this is the course for you. By exploring the process of thinking, it becomes clear that empathy plays a vital in the process of creativity and innovation. The ultimate goal for this course is for the students to become the future talent needs to prepare.  With the successful example The characteristics of the course focuses on interdisciplinary knowledge, complementary methodology and discussion of the similarities and differences, for a human-centered design, and thus make the students capable of applying their creativity beyond the form proficiency.

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師陳瑞玲,醫大8003博雅選修歷史

description.zh: 1.標準與追溯 2.尺度學 3.承載台設計 4.驅動器之使用與設計 5.基台與框架設計6.探頭設計 7.材料選用 8.溫控與防振措施 9.雜訊處理 10.對稱方法使用11.定位精度探討 12.光機電系統於半導體設備之應用13.光機電系統於光電設備之應用
description.en: Structure of mechatronic systems, mechanism of mechatronic systems, sensors, probe design, temperature control and anti-vibration measures, symmetry method uses, drivers and actuators, interface techniques, discussion on the positioning accuracy, application of physics of semiconductor device and case study.

description.zh: This course introduces students to central thematic and cultural ideas in the major texts of the early modern period, from Chaucer to Shakespeare and Milton.  Read closely by the major writers of later periods, these works are the foundation of modern English literature and western thought.  They also provide essential background knowledge for any graduate study of western culture, literature, or history of ideas.
description.en: 本課程將學生帶入早期現代的重要文學作家（如喬叟、莎士比亞、彌爾頓）作品中的文化思想與理念主題。多年來，這些作家的作品不斷地被後世的重要思想家詮釋、引用，進而建立了現代英語文學與西方思想的基礎。他們的作品亦提供學生研究西方文化、文學、及思想歷史的必要知識。

description.zh: 主要課程內容包括Visual Basic或C程式語言介紹及應用。
description.en: The major course includes the introduction of Visual Basic or C programming language and application.

notes: 計網電腦教室,限工程班三年級修課

description.zh: 介紹產品設計初期形成設計策略所必需了解的美學、機能及工程等因素，並講授產品分析之基本理論與方法。藉由實際案例的說明與練習使學習者體會產品分析之方法並討論分析結果之意涵。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and methods of product analysis, which is one of the major sources of understanding the design of esthetic, functional and engineering details in one specific product group. Case study will be carried out with implication of the results discussed followed by practical exercise in analysing a specific group of product.

name.en: Monoscience of the Characteristics of Construction Materials

description.zh: 1.X 光繞射方法 2.熱分析法 3.電子顥微鏡 4.核磁共振分析 5.孔隙學研究 6.Atomic Bonding 7.The Architecture of Solids8.Development of Microstructure 9.Surface Properties 10.Particulate Composites 11.Steel 12.Polymer and Plastics 13.Asphalt Cement and Asphalt Concrete 14.Fiber-Reinforced Composites.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。空調的基本原理、冷凍的基本循環原理，冷煤及管路、壓縮機冷凝器、膨脹閥等熱負荷之計算，冷、暖氣循環系統之負荷平衡計算，冷凍空調之控制系統介紹與計算，冷凍空調之電路系統介紹與計算。
description.en: Fundamentals: Tables of Thermodynamic Properties, Principles of Heat Transfer Classification of Refrigeration, Vapor Compression Refrigeration System, Compressors, Condensers, Evaporators, Expansion Values, Refrigerants, Pipin and Accessories, Load Calculations, Control.

name.zh: 科技政策與國家競爭力
name.en: Science and Technology Policy and National Competitiveness

description.zh: 本專題研究為對針對相關的產業政策理論及國內外經驗研究，以政治經濟學的視野回顧、解讀及展望科技產業政策的作為，特別是我國的經驗。在面臨世界經濟快速變遷下，過去的經驗給予我們什麼啟示？我國政府在制定產業政策上正面臨什麼挑戰？政府在現在與未來應如何因應調整相關政策？
description.en: This course is to introduce related theories of industrial policy and practice, and review and foresee technology policies in Taiwan and other countries through political economics. Related issues are: What inspirations do we have from past practice? What challenges does our government face when making technology policies? How can the government make appropriate technology policies for now and in the future? Etc.
